titleStmt.title: A True account of the last speeches, confessions, and execution of Christopher Vrats, George Boriskie, and John Sterne who were tryed and found guilty of the barbarous murther of Thomas Thinn, Esq. on the 12 of February last, and executed in the Pallmall, near the place where they committed the murther

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
